channel.title: CVE Feed for Foscam -- Indoor IP Camera
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Foscam -- Indoor IP Camera

item.title: CVE-2017-2833|2024-09-17T02:21:27.300Z -- foscam -- indoor%20ip%20camera
item.description: An exploitable command injection vulnerability exists in the web management interface used by the Foscam C1 Indoor HD Camera running application firmware 2.52.2.37. A specially crafted HTTP request can allow for a user to inject arbitrary shell characters resulting in command injection during the boot process. To trigger this vulnerability, an attacker needs to send an HTTP request and reboot the device.

item.title: CVE-2017-2832|2024-09-17T04:08:52.705Z -- foscam -- indoor%20ip%20camera
item.description: An exploitable command injection vulnerability exists in the web management interface used by the Foscam C1 Indoor HD Camera running application firmware 2.52.2.37. A specially crafted HTTP request can allow for a user to inject arbitrary shell characters during a password change resulting in command injection. An attacker can simply send an HTTP request to the device to trigger this vulnerability.
